message: I'll give you a small share, but I deserve more!
You're getting a bit too greedy, Bob!
You're getting desperate, Alice. Don't expect much!
Time's running out, Bob! Meet me in the middle!
You're running out of time, Alice. Don't expect any mercy!
Last chance, Bob! Meet me halfway!
You're almost out of time, Alice. Don't bother making another offer!
You're getting the lion's share, Bob. Don't be greedy!
I'm taking it all! You're out of options, Alice!
Fine, take it all. I'm out of time.
